programme.title: Live Premier League
programme.desc: Chelsea v Everton (Kick-off 12.30pm). Coverage of the top-flight match from Stamford Bridge. The hosts will be looking for three more vital points against the Toffees in their quest to finish in the Champions League places, with five places now available for next season for Premier League teams. The visitors will be looking to stop their hosts and have been on a brilliant run of form since David Moyes returned to the club in January
